question: 興味がない
sourceMnemonic: <ja>興味</ja> is <kanji>interest</kanji> in something. If you do not have (<ja>がない</ja>) that interest, then you have <vocabulary>no interest</vocabulary> or you're <vocabulary>not interested</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: You learned that the word <ja>興味</ja> uses the on'yomi readings for both kanji, so all you have to do is add <ja>が</ja> + <ja>ない</ja> and you've got a new expression!
